Intro to R-Spatial for Healthy Places Background

Intro to R-Spatial for Healthy Places Marynia Kolak 2021-08-22 Background This suite of tutorials was developed for a workshop at the 2021 R-Medicine Conference by the Health Regions & Policies Lab at the University of Chicago. A basic understanding of R is assumed. This workshop requires several packages, which can be installed from CRAN: install.packages("sf", "tmap", "tidygeocoder") For Mac users, check out https://github.com/r-spatial/sf for additional tips if you run into errors when installing the sf package. Using homebrew to install gdal usually fixes any remaining issues.
